description: The lira hits a record low against the dollar amid jitters over Turkish regional ambitions.
title: Turkish lira sinks amid Erdogan fury with allies
title_page: Turkish lira sinks amid Erdogan fury with allies - BBC News
maintext: On 23 October President Erdogan confirmed that Turkey had tested the controversial S-400 missile system. Then on Sunday he hit back at US criticism over the arms deal with Russia, saying: "You do not know who you are playing with. Go ahead with your sanctions."
